definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Li Siguang is a famous geographer.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是一位著名的地理学家。

sentences.english: Professor Shen Yuchang is a famous geographer and outstanding geomorphologist in China.
sentences.chinese: 沈玉昌教授是我国著名的地理学家和杰出的地貌学家。

sentences.english: LI Dao-yuan is one of the most famous geographers in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 郦道元是古代最著名的地理学家之一。

sentences.english: Many geographers say that the Ural Mountains form the dividing line between Europe and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 许多地理学家认为，乌拉尔山脉是欧亚两洲的分界线。

sentences.english: It is now the geographers' job to rewrite theirs.
sentences.chinese: 现在是地理学家们改写地理教科书的时候了。

sentences.english: Some natural springs geographers are interested in artesian spring.
sentences.chinese: 一些研究天然泉的地理学家对自流泉感兴趣。

sentences.english: Some geographers call these waters the Antarctica ocean.
sentences.chinese: 有些地理学家将这部分水域称为南冰洋。

sentences.english: Geographers are included in Unit Group 2724 Social Professionals.
sentences.chinese: 地理学家包含在2724职业类别的社会专家类别里。

sentences.english: LI Dao-yuan is one of the most famous geographers in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 郦道元是古代著名的地理学家之一。

sentences.english: More land planning and geographical representation is the scientist's view.
sentences.chinese: 较有代表性的是土地规划和自然地理学家的观点。

sentences.english: Geographers study the configuration of the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 地理学家研究山脉的地形轮廓。

definition: Ferdinand von Richthofen (1833-1905), German geologist and explorer who published a major foundational study of the geology of China in 1887 and first introduced the term Silk Road 絲綢之路|丝绸之路
Sven Hedin (1865-1952), famous Swedish adventurer and archaeologist, whose 1894-1900 Central Asian expeditions uncovered Kroraina or Loulan 樓蘭|楼兰
